field.name: menutype
field.label: Menu Name
field.description: The name of the menu (default is `mainmenu`)

field.name: legacy_mode
field.label: Legacy Mode
field.description: Choosing `Yes` will use Joomla! default `#mainlevel` CSS selector for root <ul> tag and `#active_menu` for active menu item. Choosing `No` will allow the use of multiple list style menu instances and multiple active menu items in same page without the loss of xHTML compliance, but require modification on `template_css.css` file to include definition of `.list_menu` and `.active_mitem` CSS selectors

field.name: full_active_id
field.label: Full Active Highlighting
field.description: Enable full active menu item highlighting, including for `Link - Component Item` and `Link - Url`, which will require modification on `template_css.css` file to include definition of `.active_mitem` CSS selector

field.name: activate_parent
field.label: Activate Parent
field.description: Enable active highlighting also for all parent menu items in the hierarchycal list menu

field.name: rootmenu_count
field.label: Root-menu Count
field.description: How many item of root-menu to display? Input 0 to display all root-menu items

field.name: submenu_deep
field.label: Sub-menu deep
field.description: How many level of sub-menu you want to show?

field.name: expand_all
field.label: Expand All
field.description: Expand all sub-menus or just sub-menu of active root-menu item?

field.name: need_jquery
field.label: Need JQuery?
field.description: Choose 'No' if you are sure that JQuery is loaded elsewhere. Choose 'Yes' if you are sure that JQuery is not loaded elsewhere

field.name: dropdown_opacity
field.label: Dropdown Menu Opacity
field.description: Dropdown Menu Opacity (not work on IE)

field.name: cache
field.label: Enable Cache
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: menuclass_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
